mdx.rawBody:
Song: jAnaki dhEvi
Film: samsAram adhu minsAram 
---
Notes: s r2 g2 m1 p d2 n2 S

jAnaki dhEvi  rAmanai thEdi 
nSS S  S  RSn nSS S   SR SRSn

iru vizhi vAsal thirandhu vaiTHAL 
nS  S M   G RSn R  S  S   S  S

rAman vandhAn mayangi vittAL 
S n   d  pmg  g m  n  d  p

than pErai kooda  marandhu vittAL 
p    S n   d  pmg g m  n   d  dSp

Stanza 1:
seedhai vaNangi  ezhundhALE kaNgaLil avanai aLandhALE 
pm gmg  p pm gmg nd   dnSSp n  n n   nR GRn nd1 d1nd1p

pAdham  pArTHu nadandhALE rahasiya punnagai purindhALE 
pm gmg  pm gmg n d  dnSSp n n n n  n  R GRn n d1 d1nd1p

pArvayil kEtkirAn badhil enna mAnE 
S  n nR  R  S SRG R G    RMG  S RSn

mownam mownam sammadham dhAnE 
nS SR  pd dn  gm n d    p  p

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
rAman seedhai mugam pArkka seedhaiyin kaNgaLO nilam pArkka 
nANam vandhu thadai pOda nAyagan angangE edai pOda 
pAvayum pAdinAL parambarai pAttu 
sabayil thaviTHAL thalaivanai pArTHu
